    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Description copied from interface: ServerComm
        Starts the Moodish server. The method should setup a server socket and begin to accept connections. This method must return immediately after a server socket has been setup, and another thread should started to listen for connections.
        Specified by:
        start in interface ServerComm

      • hasNextMessage

        public boolean hasNextMessage()
        Description copied from interface: ServerComm
        Checks if a message from a client is pending. If ServerComm.hasNextMessage() returns true, a call to ServerComm.getNextMessage() will return immediately with the oldest message in the queue. If ServerComm.hasNextMessage() returns false, a call to ServerComm.getNextMessage() will block until a message has been received.
        Specified by:
        hasNextMessage in interface ServerComm
        Returns:
        true if a message from a client is currently pending, otherwise false.

      • getNextMessage

        public ServerSideMessage getNextMessage()
        Description copied from interface: ServerComm
        Get the next message received from one of the clients. If no message is has been received, the method blocks until a message has been received.
        Specified by:
        getNextMessage in interface ServerComm
        Returns:
        The next message sent by one of the connected clients to the server

      • sendError

        public void sendError(java.lang.String toNickname,
             java.lang.String error)
        Description copied from interface: ServerComm
        Report an error to a client. An error can, for instance, be trying to be friend of a client who is not connected, trying to unfriend of a client not currently our friend, and so on.
        Specified by:
        sendError in interface ServerComm
        Parameters:
        toNickname - nickname of the client.
        error - description of the error.

        Specified by:

      • sendClientConnected

        public void sendClientConnected(java.lang.String toNickname,
                       java.lang.String userConnected)
        Description copied from interface: ServerComm
        Inform a client that a new client has connected. When a new client connects, the server should call this method for each client already connected to inform the newly connected client about the clients currently online.
        Specified by:
        sendClientConnected in interface ServerComm
        Parameters:
        toNickname - nickname of the client to whom to send the message.
        userConnected - nickname of the connected client.

      • sendClientDisconnected

                          java.lang.String userDisconnected)
        Description copied from interface: ServerComm
        Inform a client that another client disconnected.
        Specified by:
        sendClientDisconnected in interface ServerComm
        Parameters:
        toNickname - nickname of the client to whom to send the message.
        userDisconnected - nickname of client who disconnected.

      • sendMoodishMessage

        public void sendMoodishMessage(java.lang.String fromNicename,
                      java.lang.String toNickname,
                      java.lang.String message)
        Description copied from interface: ServerComm
        Send a message to a client. This method should be used to relay messages received from a client to a friend. This method should be called once for each friend.
        Specified by:
        sendMoodishMessage in interface ServerComm
        toNickname - The nickname of a friend
        message - The message

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        newFriendship - nickname of the unfriendship
